matrix module¶

class matrix.Matrix¶

Bases: object

A generic 4x4 maths matrix for transformation purposes.

inversed()¶

Returns the inverse matrix.

class matrix.RotationMatrix(vector, angle)¶

Bases: matrix.Matrix

A matrix for rotation about an arbitrary axis. See http://math.kennesaw.edu/~plaval/math4490/rotgen.pdf

class matrix.RotationZMatrix(angle)¶

Bases: matrix.Matrix

A matrix for rotation about the Z axis.

class matrix.ScaleMatrix(x, y, z)¶

Bases: matrix.Matrix

A matrix for scaling.

class matrix.TranslationMatrix(value)¶

Bases: matrix.Matrix

A matrix for translation
